info.name: Apollo Platform API
info.description:
Complete API collection for Apollo Criminal Investigation Platform.

This collection includes all endpoints for:
- Authentication & Session Management
- Multi-Factor Authentication
- Biometric Authentication
- API Key Management
- User Management
- Operations Management
- Intelligence Reports
- Search & Analytics
- Alerts & Notifications
- OSINT Intelligence
- Blockchain Forensics
- Facial Recognition
- Voice Recognition
- Geospatial Intelligence

## Getting Started

1. Set up your environment variables (use Apollo Platform Environment)
2. Start with Authentication > Login to get your JWT token
3. The token will be automatically saved and used for subsequent requests

## Authentication

Most endpoints require authentication via:
- **Bearer Token**: Include in Authorization header
- **API Key**: Include in X-API-Key header

item.name: Authentication
item.description: User authentication, registration, and session management

request.description: Login with email and password. Tokens are automatically saved to environment.
Generate MFA secret and QR code

item.name: API Keys
item.description: API key management for programmatic access

}
